mapper.select: select num, pro_type, pro_num,pay_day, pro_count, paid, subject, price from pay where phone =to_char(#{phone}) and paid='paid'

select * from( select rownum rnum, data.* from ( select num, pro_type, pro_num,pay_day, pro_count, paid, subject, price from pay where phone =to_char(#{phone}) and pro_type like '%'||#{pro_type}||'%' and paid=#{paid} order by pay_day desc) data) where rnum>=#{start} and rnum <=#{end}
select nvl(count(*),0) from pay where phone=to_char(#{phone}) and paid=to_char(#{paid}) and pro_type like '%'||#{pro_type}||'%'
